  • 07/24/2006 Sam Chris: Making a "B" sound. Also "prrr".

  • 07/28/2006 Sam Chris: Food, Nectarines
  • 07/31/2006 Sam Chris: Food, Blueberries (and you can easily notice!)

  • 08/01/2006 Chris: Drinks out of sippy cup (if we hold it)
